#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
main()
{
//cout<<primef(3);
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int n;
cin>>n;
int a[n],b[n];
int c[n];
int i;
for(i=0;i<n;++i)
{
    cin>>a[i];
}
for(i=0;i<n;++i)
{
    cin>>b[i];
}
for(i=0;i<n;++i)
{
    c[i]=a[i]*3+b[i];
}
i=n-1;
sort(c,c+n);
cout<<c[i]<<endl;
}



return 0;
}
